channel.title: Help me choose a new xbox 360 game for xbox live
channel.description:
ok so im bored...and want a new game, i got a quite a few and i only realy play online, fave tryes of games are shooter and RPG
any games u recomend?? and when i say xbox 360 i dont want a load of ....OH PLAY HALO!!! OR HALO 2!...
Tag: BreakMyRevenge if u want to se most my games :P
